body_html: @benoitsteiner I have read your Device Placement Optimization with Reinforcement Learning paper, but I have some questions about it. First, this paper has given the cost function and used adam optimizer to update parameters, what's the use of formula (3) in this paper? Second, how can I calculate the probability of placement P? Finally, is the code for this paper open source? Thank you.
